pkgmetadata.longdescription: The Exterior Calculus // Provides functionality for working with tensors, alternating tensors, wedge products, Stokes's theorem, and related concepts from the exterior calculus. Functionality for Grassman algebra is provided. The canonical reference would be: M. Spivak (1965, ISBN:0-8053-9021-9) "Calculus on Manifolds". Version stokes_1.0-8 is a reduced functionality placeholder pending upload of spray version 1.0-16 to CRAN.
